p: The number of PT-naive patients included in TCs had a peak in 1999 for clusters â‰¥3 followed by a steady decrease, while the peak in the number of patients in pairs occurred in 2002 followed by an up and down curve ( Fig 1A). This peak in 1999 includes 38% of the PT-naive cohort, which suggests transmission of HIV was still ongoing for subtype B despite the introduction of HAART.
